body:
Comment 3: 
that was my thinking too.

it might help to explain the scenario that caused me to think about this.
in package nacl/av, Image implements an interface that is compatible with
exp/draw's Context. but nacl/av does not have exp/draw as a dependency.

if a method were to be added in draw.Context that took, for example,
draw.Rectangle as an argument, it would then no longer be possible
for av to implement draw.Context without introducing exp/draw as a dependency.

a static interface type conversion such as the one above would
allow this.
